structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

law.catch_line: Registration of brand and grade -- Exceptions.

text.section: A distributor shall not be required to register any fertilizer which is already registered under KRS 250.361 to 250.451 by another person, if the label does not differ in any respect.

A blender shall not be required to register each custom-mixed farm fertilizer, but shall be required to license his firm on a form furnished by the director and to label the fertilizer as provided in subsection (2) of KRS 250.376. The label of each custom-mixed fertilizer shall be maintained by the blender for one (1) year for inspection by the director.

A distributor of custom-mixed specialty fertilizers or bulk specialty fertilizers for home lawns, golf courses, recreational areas, or other nonfarm areas shall not be required to register each grade distributed but shall license his firm on a form furnished by the director for an annual fee of one hundred dollars ($100) and label the fertilizers as provided in KRS 250.376(1). The label of each fertilizer distributed under this subsection shall be maintained by the distributor for one (1) year for inspection by the director.

law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 331, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1984.
